title-group.article-title: Total Battery Management System for Aviation Batteries

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2007 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: This paper describes GEM Power's Total Battery Management System (TBMS), a new approach to the management of all battery types including aviation batteries, by means of treatment and analysis of a matrix of battery parameters (MoP). In addition to current and voltage, the MoP includes battery ohmic resistance (Rohm), chemical resistance (Rch), electrical double layer capacity (EDLC) and battery instantaneous open circuit voltage (Ei). The MoP is created by collecting the battery's stationary and transient voltage responses to specifically designed charging/depol pulses.
